text: The 2016–17 AS-Saint-Étienne season is the 84th professional season of the club since its creation in 1933. ==Players== ===Squad information=== Players and squad numbers last updated on 20 August 2016. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
